data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 795,100 citizens of Lop Buri, Thailand, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lop Buri, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Lop Buri, Thailand be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Lop Buri.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Lop Buri access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Tai Bueng people.
Lord, the believers in the state of Lop Buri, Thailand need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Lop Buri, Thailand.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lop Buri, Thailand has a population of 795,100.

We estimate Lop Buri has 5,141 people who might know Jesus, 5,248 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 784,711 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Lop Buri, Thailand the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
